name: Girl Meets Dress
tag_list: fashion, hire, dress, rental, london, uk, handbags, startup
overview:
Girl Meets Dress is the leading designer dress rental destination, offering access to your dream wardrobe for all of life’s special occasions. Girl Meets Dress allows you to hire designer dresses at a fraction of their retail price. You can borrow over 4,000 designer pieces from over 150 designer brands. Get the dresses delivered “next day” to you – at your home, at your office, wherever you want it – and all you have to do is have fun in it and send it back in the pre-paid box when you are done.
It’s like we’re your new best friend with the massive designer wardrobe who is cool enough to let you borrow whatever you want!

WINNER Drapers ‘Best Etail Innovation’ WINNER RedBull Future 50 WINNER Handbag.com Fashion Award WINNER ‘Innovator of the Year’ Specsavers Everywoman in Retail Awards

“The answer to your prayers” – Vogue “These mice are really on the ball” - Daily Candy “Rental’s answer to Net-a-Porter” - Sunday Times Style “One of the hottest internet fashion retailers” - Guardian “Girl Meets Dress is genius” The Times
